sections.name:
BATTLE TITAN FORMATIONS
Army must contain at least 1 Chaos Emperor Titan or Chaos Warlord Titan
Army may not Mix Nurgle/Tzeentch or Slaanesh/Khorne formations

SCOUT TITAN FORMATIONS
Max 2 per Battle Titan formation
Army may not Mix Nurgle/Tzeentch or Slaanesh/Khorne formations

DAEMON ENGINE FORMATIONS
Max 1 per Battle Titan or Scout Titan formation
Army may not Mix Nurgle/Tzeentch or Slaanesh/Khorne formations

UNDIVIDED, HELL-FORGE & CHAOS NAVY ALLIES
Max 25%
